DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect Functional Electrical Stimulation ( FES ) physical performance quality life patient cardiac rehabilitation .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial aim evaluate effect functional electrical stimulation ( FES ) patient stage II III cardiac rehabilitation ( CR ) variables strength , endurance muscle tropism lower limb , functional capacity quality life . To invited participate study cardiac patient register database cardiology department University Hospital Santa Maria . The sample include patient sex undergo coronary artery bypass graft valve replacement . The subject divide two group : placebo group ( PG ) functional electrical stimulation group ( FESG ) . To verify effect intervention , protocol patient underwent following evaluation : one repetition maximum test , sit-and-stand test , perimetry thigh , six-minute walk test evaluate quality life The Medical questionnaire Study 36-item Short-Form Health Survey ( SF-36 ) .
